title: The Basic Art of Experiencing Venice: Tastes, Sights and Sounds
description: Experience Venice with Gourmand World Award Winning Author Maria Liberati, you can experience the tastes, sights and sounds fo what makes this beautiful place magical! also explore typical Venetian recipes and the history of the dishes and how people like Casanaova, Mozart and so many creative geniuses are connected to the history of Venice.
author: Maria Liberati
